metadata.title: CVE-2019-19807 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 5.3.11, sound/core/timer.c has a use-after-freecaused by erroneous code refactoring, aka CID-e7af6307a8a5. This is relatedto snd_timer_open and snd_timer_close_locked. The timeri variable wasoriginally intended to be for a newly created timer instance, but was usedfor a different purpose after refactoring.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
